recipes.title: Creamy Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.description: Rich, creamy, and packed with aromatic spices—a vegetarian classic!
instructions: Heat butter in a pan over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add tomato puree, red chili powder, salt, and sugar. Cook for 8-10 minutes until oil separates.
Add garam masala and kasuri methi. Mix well.
Add heavy cream and stir to combine.
Add paneer cubes and simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with cream and serve hot with naan or rice.

recipes.title: Tandoori Chicken
recipes.description: Juicy, flavorful chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled to perfection.
instructions: Make deep cuts in the chicken pieces to allow marinade to penetrate.
In a large bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, tandoori masala, red chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, salt, and oil.
Add chicken to the marinade and coat well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours (or overnight for best results).
Preheat grill or oven to 200°C (400°F).
If using oven, place chicken on a baking tray lined with foil. Brush with oil.
Grill or bake for 35-40 minutes, turning halfway, until chicken is charred and cooked through.
Garnish with lemon wedges and sliced onions. Serve hot with mint chutney.

recipes.title: Dal Tadka
recipes.description: Comforting lentils tempered with aromatic spices—perfect with rice!
instructions: Rinse lentils thoroughly and soak for 15 minutes.
In a pressure cooker, add lentils, water, turmeric, and salt. Cook for 3-4 whistles until soft and mushy.
Mash the dal lightly with a spoon. Set aside.
Heat ghee in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them crackle.
Add minced garlic and dried red chilies. Sauté for 30 seconds.
Add sliced onions and cook until golden brown.
Add chopped tomatoes and green chili. Cook until tomatoes soften.
Add garam masala and mix well.
Pour this tempering (tadka) over the cooked dal. Mix gently.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves. Serve hot with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Spicy Chicken Tacos
recipes.description: A fusion favorite with Indian spice twist on a Mexican classic.
instructions: In a bowl, marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, cumin, coriander, garam masala, and salt for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add marinated chicken and cook for 12-15 minutes until fully cooked and slightly charred.
Warm taco shells or tortillas in a dry pan or oven.
Assemble tacos: place chicken in shells, top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, and sliced onions.
Drizzle with sour cream or yogurt.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with lime wedges.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
recipes.description: Creamy, mildly spiced tomato-based curry with tender chicken pieces.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, half the ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.
Heat 2 tbsp butter in a pan and cook chicken until golden. Set aside.
In the same pan, add remaining butter and ginger-garlic paste. Sauté for 1 minute.
Add tomato puree and cook for 10-12 minutes until oil separates.
Add red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well.
Add the cooked chicken and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream, kasuri methi, and honey.
Simmer for 5 more minutes until the gravy thickens.
Garnish with cream and serve hot with naan or basmati rice.

recipes.title: Palak Paneer
recipes.description: Fresh spinach curry with soft paneer cubes—healthy and delicious!
instructions: Blanch spinach in boiling water for 2-3 minutes. Drain and blend with green chilies into a smooth puree.
Heat oil in a pan. Lightly fry paneer cubes until golden. Set aside.
In the same pan, add cumin seeds and let them crackle.
Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add the spinach puree and bring to a boil.
Add garam masala and salt. Mix well.
Add paneer cubes and heavy cream. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with roti or rice.

recipes.title: Vegetable Biryani
recipes.description: Aromatic basmati rice layered with spiced vegetables—a complete meal!
instructions: Soak basmati rice for 30 minutes. Boil with whole spices until 70% cooked. Drain and set aside.
Soak saffron in warm milk.
Heat ghee in a heavy-bottomed pot. Fry sliced onions until golden brown. Remove half for garnish.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for 1 minute.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add mixed vegetables, biryani masala, yogurt, and salt. Cook for 10 minutes.
Layer the cooked vegetables at the bottom of the pot.
Layer the partially cooked rice on top. Sprinkle with mint, coriander, fried onions, and saffron milk.
Cover tightly and cook on low heat for 20 minutes (dum cooking).
Gently mix and serve hot with raita and papad.

recipes.title: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.description: Quick and easy Indo-Chinese style fried rice with chicken.
instructions: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok or large pan over high heat.
Scramble the eggs and set aside.
Add remaining oil and stir-fry chicken until cooked through. Set aside.
In the same pan, add minced garlic and white part of spring onions. Sauté for 30 seconds.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Add cooked rice and break any clumps. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add soy sauce, vinegar, black pepper, and salt. Mix well.
Add cooked chicken and scrambled eggs. Toss everything together.
Garnish with green part of spring onions and serve hot.

recipes.title: Chana Masala
recipes.description: Spicy chickpea curry packed with flavor—perfect protein-rich vegetarian meal.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them crackle.
Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilies. Cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add tomato puree and cook for 8-10 minutes until oil separates.
Add coriander powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
Add boiled chickpeas with 1 cup of water. Mix and bring to a boil.
Simmer for 10-12 minutes, mashing some chickpeas to thicken the gravy.
Add garam masala and amchur powder. Mix well.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves.
Serve hot with bhature, kulcha, or rice.

recipes.title: Chicken Biryani
recipes.description: Fragrant and flavorful rice dish layered with marinated chicken—the ultimate comfort food!

ingredients.item: Whole spices (bay leaf, cinnamon, cardamom, cloves)

instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, biryani masala, red chili powder, lemon juice, and salt for 1 hour.
Soak rice for 30 minutes. Boil with whole spices until 70% cooked. Drain.
Soak saffron in warm milk.
Heat ghee in a heavy-bottomed pot. Fry sliced onions until golden brown. Remove half for garnish.
Add marinated chicken and cook for 15 minutes until chicken is cooked.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 more minutes.
Layer the chicken at the bottom of the pot.
Layer the partially cooked rice on top. Sprinkle with mint, coriander, fried onions, and saffron milk.
Cover tightly with foil and lid. Cook on high heat for 3 minutes, then low heat for 25 minutes (dum).
Let it rest for 5 minutes before opening. Gently mix and serve hot with raita.

recipes.title: Pachi Mirchi Paneer Pulao
recipes.description: Aromatic rice cooked with green chilies and paneer—a spicy South Indian delight!

ingredients.item: Whole spices (bay leaf, cinnamon, cardamom, cloves)

instructions: Wash and soak basmati rice for 30 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Heat ghee in a heavy-bottomed pan. Lightly fry paneer cubes until golden. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add cumin seeds and whole spices. Let them crackle.
Add sliced onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and slit green chilies. Sauté for 1-2 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they turn soft and mushy.
Add turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
Add green peas and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the soaked rice and gently mix. Sauté for 2-3 minutes.
Add water and bring to a boil. Add half the mint and coriander leaves.
Cover with a tight-fitting lid and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes until rice is fully cooked.
Add the fried paneer cubes and garam masala. Gently mix.
Garnish with remaining mint and coriander leaves.
Serve hot with raita or pickle.

recipes.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Authentic Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C). If using a pizza stone, place it in the oven.
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired thickness.
Mix tomato sauce with minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a 1-inch border.
Arrange sliced mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Transfer to oven and bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven and immediately top with fresh basil leaves.
Slice and serve hot.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Popular Thai stir-fried noodles with tamarind sauce and peanuts.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes. Drain.
Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and brown sugar in a bowl. Set aside.
Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Add minced garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add chicken or tofu and cook until done.
Push ingredients to the side, crack eggs into the wok and scramble.
Add soaked noodles and tamarind sauce mixture. Toss well.
Add bean sprouts and half the green onions. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Transfer to serving plates.
Garnish with crushed peanuts, remaining green onions, and lime wedges.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta cheese, olives, and crisp vegetables.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine chopped cucumbers, tomatoes, bell pepper, and red onion.
Add Kalamata olives.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the vegetables and toss gently.
Top with cubed feta cheese.
Let sit for 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Toss gently before serving.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Creamy Italian pasta with bacon, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry bacon in a large pan until crispy. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain pasta.
Remove pan from heat and add hot pasta to the bacon.
Quickly add egg mixture and toss vigorously, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
The heat from the pasta will cook the eggs without scrambling them.
Season with salt and more pepper if needed.
Garnish with fresh parsley and extra Parmesan.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Kung Pao Chicken
recipes.description: Spicy Sichuan-style stir-fry with chicken, peanuts, and vegetables.
instructions: Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, and 2 tbsp water in a bowl. Set aside.
Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Add dried red chilies and stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
Add ginger and garlic, stir-fry for 1 minute.
Add bell peppers and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Pour in the sauce mixture and stir until it thickens.
Add roasted peanuts and green onions. Toss well.
Drizzle with sesame oil.
Serve hot over steamed rice.

recipes.title: Falafel
recipes.description: Crispy Middle Eastern chickpea fritters served with tahini sauce.
instructions: Drain soaked chickpeas and add to food processor with onion, garlic, parsley, and cilantro.
Pulse until coarse mixture forms (not pureed).
Add cumin, coriander, salt, and baking powder. Mix well.
Refrigerate mixture for 1 hour.
Form into small balls or patties.
Heat oil to 350°F (175°C).
Deep fry falafel until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes.
Drain on paper towels and serve with tahini sauce.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Grilled chicken in creamy tomato-based curry sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, and half the garam masala for 2 hours.
Grill or broil chicken until charred.
Heat butter in pan and add tomato sauce.
Add remaining garam masala and turmeric.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add heavy cream and kasuri methi.
Add grilled chicken and simmer 10 minutes.
Serve with naan or rice.

recipes.title: Ramen
recipes.description: Japanese noodle soup with rich broth and toppings.
instructions: Bring broth to boil and add soy sauce and miso paste.
Cook noodles according to package directions.
Cook pork belly or chicken and slice.
Prepare soft-boiled eggs (6 minutes).
Divide noodles among bowls.
Pour hot broth over noodles.
Top with sliced meat, halved egg, green onions, nori, and bamboo shoots.
Drizzle with sesame oil.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Fettuccine Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy Italian pasta with Parmesan and butter.
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package directions.
Melt butter in large pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add heavy cream and bring to simmer.
Gradually whisk in Parmesan cheese.
Season with salt and pepper.
Toss cooked pasta with sauce.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Samosas
recipes.description: Indian crispy fried pastries filled with spiced potatoes.
instructions: Make dough: mix flour with water and oil. Knead and rest 30 minutes.
Cook filling: heat oil, add cumin seeds, ginger, and green chilies.
Add peas and spices. Mix in mashed potatoes. Cool.
Roll dough into circles, cut in half.
Form cones, fill with potato mixture, seal edges.
Heat oil to 350°F.
Deep fry samosas until golden brown.
Serve with mint chutney.
